segments.text: The garden outside the window looks so peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the chaos inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman is focused solely on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being quite sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how precariously the boy is standing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister looks excited, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit of excitement myself, watching their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing is quite alarming, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt in this kitchen today.
segments.speaker: PAR
